verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To all the wearied hearts we bring you an answer,
Yes, a nation can be born in a day.
Know, little flock, that it's our Master's good pleasure,
That by all means we can create a new day.
Chorus:
BRING IT ON! Raise a war cry that the world's gotta hear.
BRING IT ON! Rise up the trumpet's sounding is clear
BRING IT ON! Well done, He will cry in that hour
BRING IT ON! As we rise up, see the kingdom of power.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To all the fearful hearts we bring you an answer,
Our King is with us and He will not delay.
To bring about a mighty Kingdom of treasure,
To conquer all things that may stand in our way.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To all the faithful hearts we bring you an answer,
Now is the time to march in battle array.
The land is ours, it is a gift without measure,
Now is the time to come together and say:
